title: Hearts.of.Iron.IV.Update.v1.0.0.19987.to.v1.2.0 -RezMar
description:
This is Hearts of Iron 4 patchs from v1.0.0.19987 - 1.2.0 (sunflower/latest) in 3 files/zips.


Open each zip and update game (no need to copy crack after each one only last), after third one copy also updated dlcs to main folder. (all is said in instructions).

This is combined all previous patches, 3rd patch was not compatible with 2nd beta patch (sfv problem) so there is all patches which works now combined.

If you used my previous files just reinstall again 2nd patch or reinstall whole game and apply all patches again (wont loose saved game because save file its not in same directory).

Tested and working in singleplayer (CODEX release), for other realeases all info provided in patches.


Big thx to REZMAR !
